To lock settings Block! Choose apps Stop Locking Apps You have chosen not to stop locking apps
Blocks duration Set password Password off/on Friends number you can call even with block set Host number you can call even with block set Block set till: Drunk Block locks your apps Click to launch Drunk Block app
Click to call friend Click to call party host
Blocking apps was stopped! when
Drunk_Block_Notf Notifications of Drunk Block App friend host
Instruction "1. Click green 'Choose Apps' button." 2. Select which apps or services that you would like to block. "3. Click green 'To Lock Settings' button." 4. Set how long you would like the apps to be blocked for. 5. Ask yourself: Do I want the ability to unlock these apps while timer is still running?\n If YES activate password and set it. 6. If you want fill in number to a friend or/and party host that you would like to call during block. "7. Click green 'Set Block' button!" You can call emergency no. 112 if phone blocked!
HH:mm dd/MM/yyyy 112

We need your permission to check live usage of your apps for our blocks to work. Please go to Settings and let us do our job. Your permission to use phone and kill processes in background is needed to set block on phone calls if you would like to. Please give it to us and let us do our job. App would not work without permissions. Click to add them.
